data.text:
There's a slope right before the goal, so we should be proactive 
and do some training to increase our leg strength…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿There's a slope right before the goal, so we should be proactive 
󠁿and do some training to increase our leg strength…

data.text: Hmm hmm… I see!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm hmm… I see!

data.text: Oh? Sounds like appropriate advice, Suzuka.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: 󠁿Oh? Sounds like appropriate advice, Suzuka.

data.text:
Air Groove. 
Yeah, I learned a few things beforehand.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Air Groove. 
󠁿Yeah, I learned a few things beforehand.

data.text:
But, this is all information that I was unfamiliar with and 
deperately trying to learn, at least, before now.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿But, this is all information that I was unfamiliar with and 
󠁿deperately trying to learn, at least, before now.

data.text:
Everyone has times where things go well, and times 
when they don't. But, it's precisely because you've 
experienced both, that you're here, Suzuka.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone has times where things go well, and times 
󠁿when they don't. But, it's precisely because you've 
󠁿experienced both, that you're here, Suzuka.

data.text:
That's true… from now on, I'm going to try to learn lots of 
things, and step by step, continue moving forward.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿That's true… from now on, I'm going to try to learn lots of 
󠁿things, and step by step, continue moving forward.

data.text:
That way, someday, I'll pay back this 
debt from the race the other day.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿That way, someday, I'll pay back this 
󠁿debt from the race the other day.

data.text: Fuu, I won't let you win that easily.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: 󠁿Fuu, I won't let you win that easily.

data.text:
Uwaaah~ just like real rivals…! 
After my debut, do you think I'll meet someone like that…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Uwaaah~ just like real rivals…! 
󠁿After my debut, do you think I'll meet someone like that…?

data.text:
Rivals are an existence necessary for continued growth… 
that's why, we should keep working hard so we can meet them.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Rivals are an existence necessary for continued growth… 
󠁿that's why, we should keep working hard so we can meet them.

data.text:
Yeah! But first I need to win my Debut race, don't I? 
Suzuka-san, please teach me more and more about running!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah! But first I need to win my Debut race, don't I? 
󠁿Suzuka-san, please teach me more and more about running!

data.text:
In an instant she surges forward! Special Week takes the lead! 
Special Week is starting to pull away!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿In an instant she surges forward! Special Week takes the lead! 
󠁿Special Week is starting to pull away!

data.text: C'moooooon! Goooooo! Knock 'em dead!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: 󠁿C'moooooon! Goooooo! Knock 'em dead!

data.text:
Special Week reaches the goal first! 
She marks her Debut race with a victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Special Week reaches the goal first! 
󠁿She marks her Debut race with a victory!

data.text:
Hell yeah! You did it, Spe! 
When we get back to school, it's party time!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
󠁿Hell yeah! You did it, Spe! 
󠁿When we get back to school, it's party time!

data.text:
Uwoooooooooh!! That was the ultimate Debut raaaaaaaaaaace!! 
Spe-chan, congwaduwaaaaaashons!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿Uwoooooooooh!! That was the ultimate Debut raaaaaaaaaaace!! 
󠁿Spe-chan, congwaduwaaaaaashons!!

data.text:
And so begins the legend of Spe, the girl 
who aims to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿And so begins the legend of Spe, the girl 
󠁿who aims to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text:
And so begins the legend of Spe, the girl 
who aims to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿And so begins the legend of Spe, the girl 
󠁿who aims to be "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text: Yeah, looks that way.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, looks that way.

data.text: Ehehe…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Ehehe…!

data.text: …Fufuu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿…Fufuu.

data.text:
Fuu~…for some reason, 
the after party felt more exhausting than the actual Debut race.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Fuu~…for some reason, 
󠁿the after party felt more exhausting than the actual Debut race.

data.text:
If she finds out we slipped out like this, 
I wonder what Gold Ship-san is going to make us do…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿If she finds out we slipped out like this, 
󠁿I wonder what Gold Ship-san is going to make us do…

data.text: I wonder if she'll throw another party when I win a race too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿I wonder if she'll throw another party when I win a race too.

data.text:
Of course! I'll prepare some buttered potatoes! Since Suzuka-san 
was there to support me during my Debut race too!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Of course! I'll prepare some buttered potatoes! Since Suzuka-san 
󠁿was there to support me during my Debut race too!

data.text: Supported you… I didn't do anything so grand though.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Supported you… I didn't do anything so grand though.

data.text:
That's not true! You taught me how to run properly, 
you've helped me out in regards to school stuff, and and-
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿That's not true! You taught me how to run properly, 
󠁿you've helped me out in regards to school stuff, and and-

data.text:
Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, 
gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, 
󠁿gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!

data.text:
…it's the same for me. Seeing you so straight-forwardly chase 
your dreams, made me feel like I want to do the same.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿…it's the same for me. Seeing you so straight-forwardly chase 
󠁿your dreams, made me feel like I want to do the same.

data.text:
…Spe-chan's genuine feelings, 
helped me take that one big step forward.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿…Spe-chan's genuine feelings, 
󠁿helped me take that one big step forward.

data.text:
Ehehe… Suzuka-san! Just watch, I'll definitely become 
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Ehehe… Suzuka-san! Just watch, I'll definitely become 
󠁿"Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text:
And then, my mom in Hokkaido, Trainer-san, and Suzuka-san. 
I'll show you all how awesome I've become!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿And then, my mom in Hokkaido, Trainer-san, and Suzuka-san. 
󠁿I'll show you all how awesome I've become!

data.text:
Yeah, me too- For the sake of my dream I'll continue to chase 
after that "scenery" I want to see and keep on running.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, me too- For the sake of my dream I'll continue to chase 
󠁿after that "scenery" I want to see and keep on running.

data.text: Let's both promise to fulfill our dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Let's both promise to fulfill our dreams!

data.text: Yeah, I promise…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, I promise…

data.text:
…By the way, Suzuka-san. I get the feeling you changed the way 
you called my name back there, didn't you?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿…By the way, Suzuka-san. I get the feeling you changed the way 
󠁿you called my name back there, didn't you?

data.text: Eh…? Um… did I really…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…? Um… did I really…?

data.text:
You did! Don't play dumb! 
Once more! Once more please!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿You did! Don't play dumb! 
󠁿Once more! Once more please!

data.text: Fufufuu, come on…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Fufufuu, come on…

data.text: Today's main race, Silence Suzuka is the favorite!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed: 󠁿Today's main race, Silence Suzuka is the favorite!

data.text:
That girl that runs as an escape? She's the favorite, but I'm 
pretty sure her results haven't been that good…
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
󠁿That girl that runs as an escape? She's the favorite, but I'm 
󠁿pretty sure her results haven't been that good…

data.text:
That may be true, but for some reason it gets your hopes up. 
I keep wanting to see more of that running style!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
󠁿That may be true, but for some reason it gets your hopes up. 
󠁿I keep wanting to see more of that running style!

data.text: Fuu~…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Fuu~…

data.text: Looks like you're able to concentrate just fine.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿Looks like you're able to concentrate just fine.

data.text:
Because of Trainer-san, the other team members, 
and Spe-chan supporting me, I'm in perfect condition.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Because of Trainer-san, the other team members, 
󠁿and Spe-chan supporting me, I'm in perfect condition.

data.text:
Do your best, Suzuka-san! 
I'll be cheering you on from the front of the stands!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Do your best, Suzuka-san! 
󠁿I'll be cheering you on from the front of the stands!

data.text: Yeah, I'll show you I can answer to those cheers.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, I'll show you I can answer to those cheers.

data.text:
You've certainly improved your condition through training, 
all that's left is to go at it with all your might.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!
choices.processed: <size=40>Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!</size>

choices.text: Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!
choices.processed: <size=40>Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!</size>

data.processed:
󠁿You've certainly improved your condition through training, 
󠁿all that's left is to go at it with all your might.

data.text:
You've certainly improved your condition through training, 
all that's left is to go at it with all your might.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!
choices.processed: <size=40>Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!</size>

choices.text: Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!
choices.processed: <size=40>Go and get a good look at that "scenery"!</size>

data.processed:
󠁿You've certainly improved your condition through training, 
󠁿all that's left is to go at it with all your might.

data.text:
Understood! Trainer-san, I'll make 
sure you see that "scenery" too!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿Understood! Trainer-san, I'll make 
󠁿sure you see that "scenery" too!

data.text: Silence Suzuka settles in to her gate in the outermost frame.
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: 󠁿Silence Suzuka settles in to her gate in the outermost frame.

data.text:
1800m to the goal, which Uma Musume will reach the 
goal first? Prepartions complete - Start!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿1800m to the goal, which Uma Musume will reach the 
󠁿goal first? Prepartions complete - Start!!
